title: Variables in C++
subject: C++ Programming
theory:
Named storage. 
In C++, variables can be declared anywhere (even inside `for` loop). 
Dynamic Initialization: `int a = b * 2;` (Calculated at runtime).

examples.code:
for(int i=0; i<10; i++) { ... } 
// i declared locally in loop.
examples.explanation: C require declaration at top (in old versions).
